text: Hinton is an unincorporated community in Boone County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. It is located just north of Columbia. ==History== A post office called Hinton was established in 1885, and remained in operation until 1907. The community was named after John W. Hinton, a 19th-century county judge. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Boone County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Hinton, Missouri
